error.noProjects: Sie haben noch keine Projekte. Bitte kontaktieren Sie Ihren Administrator.

search.emptyStateLabel: Oh, it’s lonely in here... This project has no documents yet.

errors.internalError: Auf dem Server ist ein Problem aufgetreten

search.contextualizeFiltersDescription: Filter auf der linken Seite werden entsprechend den Suchergebnissen aktualisiert.

document.title: Dokument
document.name: Dokumentname
document.notAvailable: Für dieses Dokument ist keine Vorschau verfügbar.
document.namedEntitiesNotSearched: Dokument nicht analysiert. Um Named Entities zu durchsuchen, gehen Sie zu @:{'menu.analyse'} und starten Sie eine neue Aufgabe "@:{'indexing.findNamedEnties'}".

taskDocumentsFormOcrAlert.installOcrLanguage: Wählen Sie die zu installierenden Sprachen unter {availableLanguages} aus.

removeAll.title: Are you sure you want to delete all your projects?
removeAll.description: This action cannot be undone. It will remove all your projects and their documents from Datashare.
removeAll.success: All your projects and documents were removed from Datashare.
removeAll.error: Ein Problem ist aufgetreten. Die Dokumente konnten nicht entfernt werden.

task.title: Aufgaben
task.description: Einige Aufgaben müssen im Hintergrund ausgeführt werden. Benutzen Sie dieses Panel, um sie zu verwalten.
task.emptyStateLabel: You have not yet started any tasks. {link}

batch-search.title: Batch search
batch-search.description: Get the results of each query of a list, all at once. For instance, instead of searching for all the politicians of your country one after the other, just upload the list and see the results for each one.
batch-search.nbPublic: No shared batch searches | 1 shared batch search | {n} shared batch searches
batch-search.nbPrivate: no private batch searches | 1 shared batch search | {n} private batch search

batch-download.title: Batch download
batch-download.description: When your query has results, you can download all of them in a password-protected file.

entity-recognition.title: Entity recognition
entity-recognition.description: Know quickly what’s in your files by asking Datashare to automatically recognize names of people, locations and organizations in your documents, as well as email addresses.

document-addition.title: Document addition
document-addition.description: Index documents that are on your computer or on a drive so you can search them in Datashare. Datashare can index all type of documents.

list.emptyStateLabel: There are no entity recognitions. Do you want to find entities?
list.info: Entity recognitions are tasks that you run in order to recognize and to list the entities in your documents.

pipeline.label: Choose a model
pipeline.description: Datashare verwendet Modelle zur Verarbeitung natürlicher Sprachen.

offline.label: Möchtest du offline arbeiten?
offline.description: Select 'No' if you want to sync latest models.

form.error: An error occurred when creating the task: {error}

list.emptyStateLabel: Do you want to add documents?
list.info: Document additions are tasks that you run to ask Datashare to add new documents.

path.label: Select the folder or subfolder to analyze
path.description: The entire Datashare home will be indexed by default.

extractOcr.label: Extract text from images and PDFs (OCR)
extractOcr.description: Wenn ja, führt Datashare OCR (Optische Zeichenerkennung) durch. Dies kann bis zu zehn Mal länger dauern.

skipIndexedDocuments.label: Skip already indexed documents
skipIndexedDocuments.description: If yes, Datashare will only extract text from documents that are not indexed yet.

form.error: An error occurred when creating the task: {error}

list.emptyStateLabel: There are no batch downloads. Go to search to batch download all the documents of a search.
list.info: Batch downloads are password-protected zip files containing all the documents from one of your searches.

list.emptyStateLabel: There are no batch searches. Do you want to search a bunch of queries at once?
list.noMatches: No batch searches matched. Try removing the search filter.
list.info: Batch searches allow to get the results of each query of a list, but all at once.

name.label: Name
name.placeholder: Type the name of your batch search

visibility.label: Visibility

options.private: Private - Only you will see your batch search
options.shared: Shared - Only members of all the selected project(s) will see your batch search

visibility.description: This option can be changed later (either way)

phraseChanges.label: Sentence changes
phraseChanges.description: Also called proximity searches. Maximum number of operations (insertions, deletions, substitutions and transpositions) on terms needed to make one phrase match the other.

spellingChanges.label: Spelling changes
spellingChanges.description: Also called fuzziness. Number of change(s) in the characters in the words: insertions, deletions or substitutions of a single character, or transposition of 2 adjacent characters.

options.yes: Yes - Queries searched within double quotes
options.no: No - Apply operators (AND, OR, NOT, etc.) in the queries

form.submitError: Something went wrong, unable to run the batch search.

list.title: All documents
list.emptyStateLabel: None of the queries had matches.

batchSearchErrorModal.text: how to fix the most common errors
batchSearchErrorModal.description: The system encountered a problem. Syntax errors in the CSV are the usual suspects (see {link}).

batchSearchCardDetails.author: Autor

batchSearchCardDetails.fuzzinessValue: Spelling changes: {n} | Spelling change: {n} | Spelling changes: {n}

stop.error: Unable to stop the batch search

description.title: Ändern Sie diese Einstellungen nicht, wenn Sie sich nicht sicher sind.

languages.title: Sprachen
languages.info: Translations are maintained on Crowdin.

plugin.title: Plug-ins
plugin.info: Plugins are front-end modules to add new features in Datashare's user interface.
plugin.errorLabel: An error occurred while retrieving the plugins. Refresh the page or contact the support.

extension.title: Erweiterungen
extension.info: Extensions are back-end modules to add new features to store and manipulate data with Datashare.
extension.submitSuccess: Erweiterung erfolgreich installiert. Bitte Datashare neu starten.
extension.errorLabel: An error occurred while retrieving the extensions. Refresh the page or contact the support.

api.title: API
api.noAccess: Sie haben keinen Zugriff auf diese Seite im lokalen Modus.
api.description: An API key allows you interact with Datashare through the API, using tools like Tarentula or your own scripts.

key.warning: Please copy this key in a safe place, you won't be able to access it again on Datashare.
key.unavailable: You can only access a key when creating it.

delete.description: Any applications or scripts using this key will no longer be able to access the Datashare API. You cannot undo this action.

batchDownload.warning: Das Feature wird aktuell vom Datashare Team entwickelt.

creationDate.missing: Keine Dokumente haben kein oder ein falsches Erstellungsdatum.| 1 Dokument hat kein oder ein falsches Erstellungsdatum.| {total} Dokumente haben kein oder ein falsches Erstellungsdatum.
creationDate.missingTooltip:
Es gibt mehrere Gründe, warum ein Dokument nicht im Balkendiagramm vorhanden ist:
    - Das Dokument hat kein Erstellungsdatum
    - Das Erstellungsdatum des Dokuments liegt vor dem 1. Januar 1970
    - Das Erstellungsdatum des Dokuments liegt nach dem aktuellen Datum
